TechFest 2024 - Ad Mad Show

Unleash Your Creativity. Advertise Like a Pro!

Date of Event

18th November 2024

Coordinators

Student: Vivek Kumar Ray

Teacher: Prof. Jane Doe

About the Ad Mad Show

The Ad Mad Show is a creative advertising competition that encourages participants to think outside the box and come up with innovative advertisements for fictional products or services. Teams or individuals will create and present their ads to a panel of judges within a set time limit.

This event is a perfect blend of marketing skills, creativity, and quick thinking. The advertisements can take various formsâ€”be it skits, videos, or presentations, offering participants a platform to showcase their ideas and storytelling abilities.

Whether you're a budding marketer, content creator, or just love to present and perform, the Ad Mad Show will push your creative limits and test your advertising acumen. The most innovative and entertaining ads will win exciting prizes!
